services.paragraph1:
We provide Modeling and Information Management services under 
ISO Quality standards, allowing the exchange of information in an agile, complete, 
and consistent manner, from the beginning and throughout the life cycle of each project.

3d.title: 3D
3d.subtitle: Analysis
3d.text:
It allows finding 
solutions in the geometric 
modeling process. 
In this phase the viability 
of the construction 
is analyzed.

4d.title: 4D
4d.subtitle: Planning
4d.text:
It allows early 
detection of possible 
problems in the design, 
as well as 
scheduling progress based 
on work periods 
and setting time goals.

5d.title: 5D
5d.subtitle: Budget estimate
5d.text:
Cost information 
is incorporated into 
the model, 
which allows forecasting 
a budget based 
on all the 
information collected.

6d.title: 6D
6d.subtitle: Sustainability
6d.text:
It allows the evaluation 
of the social, 
economic and environmental impact, 
as well as the energy 
efficiency studies 
that start from the model 
such as electrical, 
hydrosanitary, and HVAC.

7d.title: 7D
7d.subtitle: Management
7d.text:
It allows 
operational management 
to be carried out throughout 
the useful life 
of the building or asset, 
also called 
Facility Management.
